p: All the experiments were conducted in accordance with a guide for the care and use of laboratory animals: Eighth Edition by National Research Council, Division on Earth and Life Studies, Institute for Laboratory Animal Research, Committee for the Update of the Guide for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals. We also followed OECD guideline 434. Ethical approval was obtained from Research and Ethical Review Board of College of Medicine and Health Sciences, University of Gondar before the initiation of this study (protocol number sop4/73/09). At the end of the experiment, the animals were killed by Phenobarbital sodium at a dose of 150 mg/kg (euthanasia, mercy killing).
